dating.allowed: Avalo allows dating, flirting, romance and emotional expression, including sensual and attractive self-presentation without nudity.

aiVoice.voicePackSubtitle: Choose the voice style for your AI companion
aiVoice.previewMessage_romantic: This voice style is warm, tender, and emotionally expressive. Perfect for intimate and heartfelt conversations.
aiVoice.previewMessage_playful: This voice style is fun, energetic, and lighthearted. Great for creating a cheerful and engaging atmosphere.
aiVoice.previewMessage_confident: This voice style is assertive, direct, and self-assured. Ideal for professional and straightforward interactions.
aiVoice.previewMessage_mysterious: This voice style is intriguing, enigmatic, and captivating. Perfect for building curiosity and anticipation.
aiVoice.previewMessage_sultry: This voice style is seductive, alluring, and sensual. Ideal for creating an intimate and passionate connection.
aiVoice.vipDiscountInfo: VIP members get 10% off (minimum 1 token, never free)

desc.WARMING_UP: You're starting to stay in touch more often.
desc.LOYAL: You regularly stay in touch and show interest.
desc.VIP_FAN: You're one of their most engaged supporters.
desc.ROYAL_FAN: You're among their top, most loyal fans.

highlight.chatsAndViews: You often visit the profile and reply to messages.
highlight.livesAndPpv: You join LIVE sessions and unlock premium content regularly.
highlight.newConnection: A good moment to send a thoughtful first message.
highlight.quietButPresent: You don't write much, but you consistently show up.

stats.lives: You joined {{count}} of their LIVE sessions

recommendations.gaining: This connection is growing stronger! They respond quickly and show genuine interest. Keep the momentum going.
recommendations.stable: Your connection is consistent and healthy. Continue engaging naturally to maintain this positive dynamic.
recommendations.cooling: Activity has slowed down recently. Consider reaching out with something they find interesting.
recommendations.atRisk: Warning ‚Äî This connection is fading. Response times are much slower than before. Start a conversation about a topic they care about.
recommendations.newConnection: Great start! Send a thoughtful message to build the relationship.
recommendations.highEngagement: Amazing connection! They're very responsive and engaged with your messages.
recommendations.needsAttention: This relationship needs some attention. Initiate a conversation they'll enjoy.
recommendations.regularContact: You maintain great regular contact. Keep up the positive interactions!
recommendations.increasedInterest: They're showing more interest lately. This is a good time to deepen the connection.
recommendations.dropInActivity: There's been a drop in activity. A friendly check-in could help re-engage.
recommendations.consistentPattern: Your interaction pattern is steady and reliable. Great work!
recommendations.peakEngagement: This is peak engagement! Make the most of this positive momentum.
recommendations.criticalMoment: Critical moment ‚Äî reach out now to prevent this connection from going cold.
recommendations.warmingUp: The relationship is warming up nicely. Continue with engaging conversations.
recommendations.maintainBalance: Good balance between both sides. Keep the natural flow going.
recommendations.initiativeNeeded: Take more initiative in starting conversations to strengthen this bond.
recommendations.respondQuickly: They respond quickly to you. Match their energy to build stronger rapport.
recommendations.qualityTime: Focus on quality interactions rather than frequency for this connection.
recommendations.sharedInterests: Leverage your shared interests to create deeper conversations.
recommendations.positiveVibes: The sentiment is very positive. They enjoy talking with you!
recommendations.neutralZone: The connection is neutral. Try introducing more engaging topics.
recommendations.needsBoost: This connection needs a boost. Share something exciting or ask about their interests.

‚Ä¢ Timer starts immediately after creation
‚Ä¢ You'll receive notifications 10 min and 5 min before end
‚Ä¢ Click "I'm safe" to confirm OK
‚Ä¢ If you don't confirm, trusted contacts will get an alert
‚Ä¢ You can cancel the timer anytime

panicButtonComponent.title: Panic Button

panicButtonComponent.confirmMessage: This will immediately notify your trusted contacts. Use only in genuine emergencies.
panicButtonComponent.alertSentMessage: Your trusted contacts have been notified. Help is on the way.
panicButtonComponent.error: Could not send panic alert. Please try again or contact emergency services directly.
panicButtonComponent.info: Use only in genuine emergencies. Your trusted contacts will immediately receive a notification with your last known location.

‚Ä¢ If you don't confirm, trusted contacts will be notified

messages.SIGNUP: To create an Avalo account, you must accept our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

messages.REQUEST_PAYOUT: To request a payout, you must accept the latest Payout Terms.
messages.SUBMIT_KYC: To submit KYC verification, you must accept our KYC Terms.
